text: Owl is a sculpture eight metres tall, designed by Bruce Armstrong. Its full name is The Big Powerful Owl. It is in Canberra, Australia. Owl was built in 2011, and is one of the 150 megasculptures of Australia. ==Criticism== The shape of the owl has spared some criticism but remained a great tourist attraction from all over Australia. The statue has also been prone to graffiti and the ACT government had to spend $3000 on removing the graffiti. == Gallery == File:Giant Owl.jpg File:Owl sculpture.jpg == References == Category:Canberra Category:Sculptures Category:2011 works Category:2010s in art
title: Owl (sculpture)
